name: Wild Divine: The Creation and Launch of Zen Journey
blurb: Zen Journey is not just another game, it's an evolution and a revolution in the use of biofeedback technology in a gaming experience.

rewards.reward: KickStarter Friend: Your name on our Zen Journey contributors\u2019 page on the website for all to see with our eternal thanks!

Contributor: Your name on contributors page, and the Story of Buddha video as told by Zen Master Nissim Amon, recorded exclusively for Zen Journey and a spectacular video presentation for our supporters!

Advisor: You receive the two prizes above, PLUS your own personal password to an exclusive \u201cmembers only\u201d area within the Wild Divine site in which you can exchange ideas and advice with Wild Divine team members as well as other members and have an impact on future projects! We love our expert supporters\u2019 input!

Grasshopper: You receive all of the above, PLUS the PRE-RELEASE Zen Journey program, ready for your Iom/Lightstone. (Iom/Lightstone recommended, but not required) Be one of the first to experience the amazing Zen Journey!
White Robe: You receive all the above, PLUS the game in which your name will be etched in the WildDivineOnline.com Hall of Fame for all to see forever! Make yourself a part of the experience.
Blue Robe: You receive all the above, PLUS the Wild Divine Iom, the Active Feedback Hardware. As a bonus, this will ship as soon as the project funds, so you'll be ready to go on launch day!

Purple Robe: You receive all the above, PLUS you can honor a loved one or pet by having a picture of that person or pet on the Wall of Remembrance inside the game. This will make the game experience exceptionally powerful for you personally! You'll also have access to the Beta Test so that you'll be the first one viewing your tribute.
Orange Robe: You receive all the above, PLUS an exclusive Project Outtakes video, two total Ioms and custom screen prints signed by Corwin Bell, the award winning designer, suitable for framing!

Black Robe: You receive all the above, PLUS three total Ioms, a personally signed copy of Zen Master Nissim Amon\u2019s \u201cThe Book of Dharma\u201d and special \u201cbehind the scenes\u201d video detailing the making of Zen Journey.

Golden Robe: All the above, PLUS an honorary landmark of your choice in the game in your honor, executive producer credit in the game and on the Wild Divine site for all to see and 5 total Ioms and copies of the software. Make yourself an elite member of the project!

Divine Master: You receive everything above, PLUS a personal invitation for yourself and 3 guests to attend the Launch Party in Santa Monica, California while spending private time with Zen Master Nissim Amon. I've been privileged to have this private time, and I can tell you, it is a priceless experience. You'll spend the day with the Wild Divine team and attend the amazing evening Launch Party with outstanding food and beverages. You and your guests will mingle with thought leaders in the industry and will enjoy being honored for your contribution in making Zen Journey realize its full potential!
